briefdescription.para: Construct a new symbol button.

detaileddescription.para: Use dialogTitle string to define the title to show in the symbol settings dialog.

briefdescription.para: Returns a clone of the current symbol (as the specified template type) defined by the button.
Returns the title for the symbol settings dialog window.
Returns the layer associated with the widget.
Returns the map canvas associated with the widget.
Returns the message bar associated with the widget.
Register an expression context generator class that will be used to retrieve an expression context for the button when required.
Sets the title for the symbol settings dialog window.
Sets a layer to associate with the widget.

detaileddescription.para:
This allows the widget to setup layer related settings within the symbol settings dialog, such as correctly populating data defined override buttons.
layer()

briefdescription.para: Sets a map canvas to associate with the widget.

detaileddescription.para:
This allows the widget to fetch current settings from the map canvas, such as current scale.
mapCanvas()

briefdescription.para: Sets the message bar associated with the widget.

detaileddescription.para:
This allows the widget to push feedback messages to the appropriate message bar.
messageBar()
QGIS 3.6

briefdescription.para: Sets the symbol type which the button requires.

detaileddescription.para:
If the type differs from the current symbol type, the symbol will be reset to a default symbol style of the new type.
symbolType()

briefdescription.para: Returns the current symbol defined by the button.
Returns the symbol type which the button requires.
Copies the current symbol color to the clipboard.
Copies the current symbol to the clipboard.
Pastes a color from the clipboard to the symbol.

detaileddescription.para:
If clipboard does not contain a valid color or string representation of a color, then no change is applied.
copyColor()

briefdescription.para: Pastes a symbol from the clipboard.

detaileddescription.para:
If clipboard does not contain a valid symbol then no change is applied.
copySymbol()

briefdescription.para: Sets the current color for the symbol.

detaileddescription.para: Will emit a changed() signal if the color is different to the previous symbol color.

briefdescription.para: Sets the symbol for the button.

detaileddescription.para:
Ownership of symbol is transferred to the button.
symbol()
changed()

briefdescription.para: Emitted when the symbol's settings are changed.
Creates the drop-down menu entries.
Attempts to parse mimeData as a color, either via the mime data's color data or by parsing a textual representation of a color.

simplesect.para: true if mime data could be intrepreted as a color

parameterdescription.para: will be set to true if mime data also included an alpha component

briefdescription.para: Create a color icon for display in the drop-down menu.
Regenerates the text preview.

detaileddescription.para: If color is specified, a temporary color preview is shown instead.

briefdescription.para: A button for creating and modifying QgsSymbol settings.

detaileddescription.para: The button shows a preview icon for the current symbol, and will open a detailed symbol editor dialog (or panel widget) when clicked.
